title: A Place to begin: St Andrews by the Northern Sea
creator_credit: Pelicula, Films of Scotland and Mark Littlewood
brief_description: St. Andrews, once the ecclesiastical capital of the country, has the oldest university in Scotland, and is the headquarters of the Royal & Ancient Golf Club. The film shows the town, past and present.
